description: Gusts of up to 70mph have led the cancellation of ferry crossings and flights from the Isle of Man.
title: Storm Ciara: Severe gales lead to Isle of Man ferry and flight disruption
title_page: Storm Ciara: Severe gales lead to Isle of Man ferry and flight disruption - BBC News
maintext: Sunday evening's Ben-my-Chree sailing between Douglas and Heysham has been brought forward by an hour to 19:00 GMT, while its overnight return is due to depart as scheduled at 02:15, Isle of Man Steam Packet Company said.
